title: Criticism of the Western Civilization-Collection 69 (Sexmania3)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 69 (Sexmania 3):

Previously, the title of this subgroup was: 'Hypersexual Society'. It is changed to: Sexmania.. It encompasses topics such as: sexualization of the society, hypersexuality, pornography, prostitution, extramarital affairs, ..

We have 35 titles here:

-  Akdeniz - Internet Child Pornography and the Law; National and International Responses (2008)

-  Attwood (Ed.) - Mainstreaming Sex; the Sexualization of Western Culture (2009)

-  Bell - Hard to Get; 20-Something Women and the Paradox of Sexual Freedom (2013)

-  Burke - Christians under Covers; Evangelicals and Sexual Pleasure on the Internet (2016)

-  Cabezas - Economies of Desire; Sex Tourism in Cuba and the Dominican Republic (2009)

-  Carroll - Royal Affairs; a Lusty Romp Through the Extramarital Adventures That Rocked the British Monarchy (2008)

-  de Marneffe - Liberation and Prostitution (2010)

-  Eig - The Birth of the Pill; How Four Crusaders Reinvented Sex and Launched a Revolution (2014)

-  Flowers - The Fantasy Factory; an Insider's View of the Phone Sex Industry (1998)

-  Grebowics - Why Internet Porn Matters (2013)

-  Heath - The Illusory Freedom; the Intellectual Origins and Social Consequences of the Sexual Revolution (1978)

-  Hilliard & Keith - Dirty Course; Sex and Indecency in Broadcasting, 2e (2007)

-  Lane - Obscene Profits; the Entrepreneurs of Pornography in the Cyber Age (2001)

-  Malarek - The Natashas; the New Global Sex Trade (2003)

-  Orenstein - Girls & Sex; Navigating the Complicated New Landscape (2016)

-  Outshoorn (Ed.) - The Politics of Prostitution; Women's Movements, Democratic States and the Globalisation of Sex Commerce (2004)

-  Paul - Pornified; How Pornography is Damaging Our Lives, Our Relationships, and Our Families (2005)

-  Peakman - The Pleasure's All Mine; a History of Perverse Sex (2013)

-  Perrottet - The Sinner's Grand Tour; a Journey Through the Historical Underbelly of Europe (2011)

-  Raymond - Not a Choice, Not a Job; Exposing the Myths about Prostitution and the Global Sex Trade (2013)

-  Reichert & Lambiase (Eds.) - Sex in Consumer Culture; the Erotic Content of Media and Marketing (2006)

-  Reist & Bray (Eds.) - Big Porn Inc.; Exposing the Harms of the Global Pornography Industry (2011)

-  Rosen - Beaver Street; a History of Modern Pornography (2011)

-  Ross - Burlesque West; Showgirls, Sex, and Sin in Postwar Vancouver (2009)

-  Russell (Ed.) - Rape in Art Cinema (2010)

-  Sides - Erotic City; Sexual Revolutions and the Making of Modern San Francisco (2009)

-  Simm - Sex in Peace Operations (2013)

-  Skinner - Treating Pornography Addiction; the Essential Tools for Recovery (2005)

-  Slim - Pimp; the Story of My Life (1987)

-  Smith - Whore Stories; a Revealing History of the World's Oldest Profession (2012)

-  Stenzel & Nesdahl - Nobody Told Me; .. the Physical and Emotional Consequences of Sex Outside of Marriage (2010)

-  Thomburgh & Herbert (Eds.) - Youth, Pornography and the Internet, NRC (2002)

-  Tibbals - Exposure; a Sociologist Explores Sex, Society, and Adult Entertainment (2015)

-  Weitzer - Legalizing Prostitution; From Illicit Vice to Lawful Business (2012)

-  Wilson - Your Brain on Porn; Internet Pornography and the Emerging Science of Addiction (2014)
